video:video.video:title: Hiking 21 Km in Peak Autumn Colors
video:video.video:description: This weekend, we went hiking 21 Km in a remote region at North of Quebec, to see the Autumn Leaves. The trail spreads between Mount DÃ´me and Mount Ecluse Lake. video:video.video:title: The Spartan Race Experience | Full Documentary
video:video.video:description: In this video, I take you through my Spartan Race experience at Mont-Tremblant. From staying at a cozy hostel, to volunteering, racing, and exploring the area with kayaking and mountain kartingâ€”this wasnâ€™t just a challenge... it was a full adventure. Along the way, I share what the Spartan Race is all about, how it tests you, and what it gave back to me in return. Whether youâ€™re curious about doing your first race, planning a visit to Mont-Tremblant, or just here for the storyâ€”I hope you enjoy the ride. â–¶ Become a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/c/ekadventure â–¶ Featured in this video: - Manitonga Hostel â€“ Mont-Tremblant stay - Spartan Race (Sprint Mode â€“ 5KM) - Kayaking on Lake Tremblant - Mountain Karting at the resort â–¶ Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOdgQ-R9q50rOmIDTVU8b_A?sub_confirmation=1 â–¶ Music used: - Dreams Reborn by Jeremiah Alves from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/jeremusic70-25199461/ - Static Love by TurtleBeats from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/turtlebeats-46526702/ - Travel Desire by TurtleBeats from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/turtlebeats-46526702/ - Energy Pill by music_for_video from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/music_for_video-22579021/ - Energetic Music by Ikoliks from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/lkoliks-48415707/ - Energetic Rock by Dmitry Taras from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/users/soundgallerybydmitrytaras-11640913/ â–¶ Social Media: - Instagram: https://instagram.com/e.kadventure - Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@e.kadventure â–¶ Blog: https://ekadventure.com/ â–¶ Chapters: 00:00 Introduction 01:08 The Hostel 02:27 Volunteer Day 03:55 Race Day 13:58 Lake Tremblant & Resort 14:35 Thank You - Special Message #documentary #storytelling #adventure #hiking #viral #outdoor #vlog #blogger #youtube #fyp #nature #wildlife #landscape #challenge #podcast #trail #video #audience #christmas #experience #outdoorvibes #travel #quebec #shorts #canada #meditation #silent #healing #peaceful #journey #challenge #spartan

video:video.video:title: 5 Days in France and Switzerland | Paris, Annecy, Vevey and Hiking lake Annecy
video:video.video:description: This summer we went on a vacation to France and Switzerland two of the top destinations for a long vacation in Europe. We went to Paris the city of Love, Annecy, a remote French town and Vevey in Switzerland. The journey also took us on a hike near lake Annecy and we got to visit a friend of mine in Switzerland. In this video, we'll explore the places that we went to, as well as the different mix of Arts, Culture, Food and Iconic moments. â–¶ Become a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/c/ekadventure â–¶ Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOdgQ-R9q50rOmIDTVU8b_A?sub_confirmation=1 â–¶ Hiking Lake Annecy: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZBNiaEtLZ0 â–¶ Social Media: - Instagram: https://instagram.com/e.kadventure - Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@e.kadventure - Blog: https://ekadventure.com/ â–¶ Chapters: 00:00 Travel Guide 00:48 At The Airport 02:33 The Triumph Arc 03:14 Train to Annecy 03:42 Annecy 06:00 The Lake 06:20 Annecy At Night 06:34 Hiking Near The Lake 08:35 The View At The Top 09:43 Vevey Switzerland 10:18 The Louvres Museum 11:11 The Egyptian Culture 11:23 The French Paintings 11:35 Mona Lisa 12:34 Greek Antiquities And More 13:09 Thank You #adventure #hiking #viral #outdoor #vlog #blogger #france #youtube #fyp #nature #lake #annecy #wildlife #landscape #challenge #podcast #trail #video #audience #ancient #experience #firstvlog #outdoorvibes #travel #montblanc #travel #tourism #paris #france #switzerland #charliechaplin #exotic #exploring #discovery #planning #mountains #louvremuseum #culture #arts #monument #statue

video:video.video:title: My First French Hike Experience | Hiking 10 Km in Annecy
video:video.video:description: My first French Hike experience takes place in the beautiful city, Annecy. We started our hike near Veyrier-du-Lac and passed through Mont Veyrier, Mont Baron and Col des Sauts. The trail at the top offers a breathtaking view over the Lake of Annecy, and from distance, we were able to see the top of Mont Blanc. â–¶ Become a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/c/ekadventure â–¶ Subscribe for more: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOdgQ-R9q50rOmIDTVU8b_A?sub_confirmation=1 â–¶ Social Media: - Instagram: https://instagram.com/e.kadventure - Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@e.kadventure - Blog: https://ekadventure.com/ â–¶ Chapters: 00:00 Intro 00:26 The Trail 00:59 Top of Mont Blanc 01:14 Lake of Annecy 01:36 Heading back 02:23 Storytelling #adventure #hiking #viral #outdoor #vlog #blogger #france #youtube #fyp #nature #lake #annecy #wildlife #landscape #challenge #podcast #trail #video #audience #ancient #experience #firstvlog #outdoorvibes #travel #montblanc

video:video.video:title: Hiking Through Ancient Roman Ruins | Lebanon
video:video.video:description: As part of our trip this summer, we went to Lebanon and hiked at one of my favorite places to go! Mount Moussa Biosphere Reserve features a rich biodiversity and is home to a wide variety of wildlife and rare animals. It also contains ancient, prehistorical roman ruins and century-old houses that are accessible through most of the trails within the reserve. â–¶ Become a Patron: https://www.patreon.com/c/ekadventure 00:00 Intro 01:10 The Rock Hyrax 02:28 The old houses and a Wild Boar 03:20 A sweet spot and the Roman Basin 03:45 Something to consider 03:58 Finale Social Media: - Instagram: https://instagram.com/e.kadventure - Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@e.kadventure - Blog: https://ekadventure.com/ #adventure #hiking #viral #outdoor #vlog #blogger #lebanon #youtube #fyp #nature #biospherereserve #wildlife #landscape #fallseason #challenge #autumnadventure #autumnhike #podcast #trail #video #audience #ancient #ruins #century #romans #prehistoric

video:video.video:title: Hiking with Ropes and Ladders | Abris sous Roches
video:video.video:description: Abris Sous Roches is a hiking trail located in the Massif du Sud Regional park, ChaudiÃ¨res-Appalaches region, in Quebec. 1h10m away from Quebec City, this trail is really fun to do and is considered to be family friendly. video:video.video:title: Solo Hiking a Foggy Mountain | Mount Lac des Cygnes
video:video.video:description: Mount Lac des Cygnes is located in Grands-Jardins National Park, Charlevoix. 1h45m away from Quebec City, this mountain ranks as one of the top moderate hikes to do in Quebec. video:video.video:title: Day Hike | The Wolves Trail - Jacques Cartier National Park, Quebec
video:video.video:description: Jacques Cartier National Park is located in Quebec, Canada, and it's well known for its trails that attract many hikers across the province. We did the Wolves Trail that is considered to be difficult, so it was a great challenge for us.
